pkgmetadata.longdescription: North Temperate Lakes - Microbial Observatory 16S Time Series Data and Functions // Analyses of OTU tables produced by 16S rRNA gene amplicon sequencing, as well as example data. It contains the data and scripts used in the paper Linz, et al. (2017) "Bacterial community composition and dynamics spanning five years in freshwater bog lakes," doi: 10.1128/mSphere.00169-17.
